query: ALTER TABLE workspace_domain ADD CONSTRAINT workspace_domain_chk_name_is_valid CHECK( name ~ '^(([a-z0-9])|([a-z0-9][a-z0-9-]*[a-z0-9]))$' ), ADD CONSTRAINT workspace_domain_chk_max_domain_name_length CHECK( (LENGTH(name) + LENGTH(tld)) < 255 ), ADD CONSTRAINT workspace_domain_fk_tld FOREIGN KEY(tld) REFERENCES domain_tld(tld);
